Name: Bamboo (Savoy's 1930 recipe)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Review: The simplest, one of the best and dryest renditions of the Bamboo cocktail. It may be simple but the combination of vermouth and fino makes for a fabulously complex cocktail.
History: Adapted from Harry Craddock's 1930 The Savoy Cocktail Book .
Nutrition: One serving of Bamboo (Savoy's 1930 recipe) contains 99 calories
